- ROYAL COURT and FAMILY TREE: in the royal court it's now possible to interact with family members, partners, lovers and leaders of other factions by talking to them.

- ANIMATIONS: Added some animations to make the game more engaging

Round 4: State: <Navigate up /><Information /><More options /><CREDITS /><NEWS /><SUGGESTIONS /><What's new in the expansion 4.0 Way of Life:
- ROYAL COURT and FAMILY TREE: in the royal court it's now possible to interact with family members, partners, lovers and leaders of other factions by talking to them.
- PARTNERS AND LOVERS: it'ss now possible to interact with your partners and manage sentimental relationships. Having happy partners improves the personality of your sons and, consequently, the chances that they will have positive traits.
- FACTION LEADERS: It's now possible to interact with the leaders of other factions. Improving relations with leaders allows you to obtain benefits on the diplomatic agreement with the faction they belong.
- LIFESTYLE TRAITS: it's now possible for each ruler to acquire traits due to their lifestyle that will add to the initial traits. The traits acquired will depend on the decisions made by the rulers and on their way of governing the kingdom.
- MERCENARIES: It's now possible to recruit armies of mercenaries
- ANIMATIONS: Added some animations to make the game more engaging

- PARTNERS AND LOVERS: it'ss now possible to interact with your partners and manage sentimental relationships. Having happy partners improves the personality of your sons and, consequently, the chances that they will have positive traits.

Round 2: State: <Navigate up /><Information /><More options /><CREDITS /><NEWS /><SUGGESTIONS /><What's new in the expansion 4.0 Way of Life:

- PARTNERS AND LOVERS: it'ss now possible to interact with your partners and manage sentimental relationships. Having happy partners improves the personality of your sons and, consequently, the chances that they will have positive traits.
- FACTION LEADERS: It's now possible to interact with the leaders of other factions. Improving relations with leaders allows you to obtain benefits on the diplomatic agreement with the faction they belong.

- ANIMATIONS: Added some animations to make the game more engaging

- FACTION LEADERS: It's now possible to interact with the leaders of other factions. Improving relations with leaders allows you to obtain benefits on the diplomatic agreement with the faction they belong.
- LIFESTYLE TRAITS: it's now possible for each ruler to acquire traits due to their lifestyle that will add to the initial traits. The traits acquired will depend on the decisions made by the rulers and on their way of governing the kingdom.
- MERCENARIES: It's now possible to recruit armies of mercenaries
- ANIMATIONS: Added some animations to make the game more engaging
- MERCHANDISE SHOP: The game store has been extended. You can now buy Dynasty Points, Precious Chests, Legendary Heirlooms and remove ads />

Round 1: State: <Navigate up /><Information /><More options /><CREDITS /><NEWS /><SUGGESTIONS /><What's new in the expansion 4.0 Way of Life:
- ROYAL COURT and FAMILY TREE: in the royal court it's now possible to interact with family members, partners, lovers and leaders of other factions by talking to them.
- PARTNERS AND LOVERS: it'ss now possible to interact with your partners and manage sentimental relationships. Having happy partners improves the personality of your sons and, consequently, the chances that they will have positive traits.
- FACTION LEADERS: It's now possible to interact with the leaders of other factions. Improving relations with leaders allows you to obtain benefits on the diplomatic agreement with the faction they belong.
- LIFESTYLE TRAITS: it's now possible for each ruler to acquire traits due to their lifestyle that will add to the initial traits. The traits acquired will depend on the decisions made by the rulers and on their way of governing the kingdom.

- ANIMATIONS: Added some animations to make the game more engaging
